resources.string: Don't use personal gmail, use tepmail
Already purchased but premium not displaying?
Please enter order number to check, e.g GPA.1234-5678-9012-12345
This order contains days of premium:
User email of the order is:
Purchased premium not showing? Click to check
Order does not exist. This only works with orders after Feb.8 2025
Order number should start with GPA. For example, a valid order number looks like GPA.1234-5678-9098-12345. You can find order number on your Google play order history
Free forever. Upgrade to premium to enjoy more privilege and features
Are you sure you want to log out?

If you purchased VIP but current account does not display VIP access, then you might have purchased VIP for a different account. Try to login back to your previous GG Mouse Pro account on which you purchased vip. If you forgot what account you used, please enter your Google play order number below and click check. The order number can be found on your Google play order history and starts with GPA. If it still cannot be solved, please contact GG Mouse Pro support team
Failed to redeem the code. Reason:
Please enter redeem code. Redeem code can be purchased from authorized sellers or be obtained from official events
1. Purchase Premium 2. Complete Tasks 3.Premium members receive monthly rewards
Already have an account? Sign in
On the other device, please select "Always allow from this computer" and click OK button
Please connect to the device that needs to be activated with USB cable If this device prompts whether to allow access to other devices, please click OK

Imporant: You may need to replug the cable several times for this device to recognize the connection of the other device that needs to be activated. When you see this device is charging the other device, then it typically means this device recognizes the other device successfully
The other phone is activated! Click OK to leave this page
I have read and agree to the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy"
Already have an account? Sign in
Password field is empty. Please enter your password
Password and confirm password do not match. Please make sure password and confirm password are the same
Login failed. Incorrect username or password
New users will be automatically registered after successful login
I have read and agree to the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy"
New users will be automatically registered
If the activation process fails, please check whether you have given super user privileges to this app in Magisk
Unable to navigate to Shizuku. Please make sure that Shizuku is installed on your device. If already installed, you can open Shizuku app manually and start server on the Shizuku app
After clicking OK, navigate to the setting to grant the notification permission
If this option doesn't detect correctly, please re-enable "wireless debugging" option
Pairing Timeout. Please click "Revoke USB debugging authorizations" in Developer options and reboot your phone. Then try to pair again
4. Wait For the Port Being Opened Automatically
If there is no response for a long time, please unpair and re-pair
After clicking OK, navigate to the setting to grant the overlay window permission
Not responding? Disable and re-enable "USB debugging" option in "Developer Options" page
This App needs background running permission to prevent being killed by the system when running in background
Email not received? Check your junk folder
Please enter your new password again
New password field is empty. Please enter new password
You cannot use any of your passwords in the past year. Please switch to another one.
Unknown error. Updating this app might solve the problem
Verification code field is empty. Please enter the verification code you received by email
Please wait for cooldown and try again later
Not activated. Unable to play games using mouse, keyboard or game controller.
Please activate first. Tap OK to be redirected the activation tool. You can also reactivate according to the prompts in the activation management section located in More - Activation Assistant
Save Failed. Unable to Write File
Please Select At Least A Point
Unable to Delete Basic Data Point. Please Select Another One
Tip: Press and hold the left CTRL or WIN key to activate the multi-select function
Please click delete first. Otherwise coefficients will not take effect.
Adjust value shortcut: pressing left control button and scrolling mouse wheel
The adjustment value can be set here. Each time the key is pressed, the value will be increased/decreased by the corresponding value

After binding the button, you can press the button to adjust the recoil control value. It replaces the default adjustment hotkey(CTRL+wheel). After adding this hotkey, the default hotkey will be invalid
Please select the activation method. If you want to change the activation method in the future, you can do so in the App by clicking on More - Activation Mode option.
Please select keymap server. Please select the server that is closest to your country. Brazilian users should select USA server.
Please find the option "USB Debugging (Security Settings)" in Developer Options and turn it on, otherwise you can't use the analog click function.
You have to upload pointer image. Go to App - More - Customize Mouse Style
Set this lower if you have low performance phone
Press F9 to switch display state
Please update the firmware to version 1601 or above

You need a high performance cellphone/tablet in order to select this option. Otherwise there might be delays when you play games. If there are delay problems, it is recommended to choose a return rate of 500hz or lower! Are you sure you want to choose 1000hz polling rate?
Can't connect to wireless debugging service.
%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Higher refresh rate might impact the performance
Tips: Click mouse scroll wheel to hide mouse pointer by default. You can change it in the keymap editor
Tips: Purchase premium subscription (just a price of coffee) to unlock more features, including Freefire premium sensitivity (no acceleration).
Please turn the option "USB Debugging (Security Settings)" in the developer settings on, otherwise this app will not work
Please add at least one keymap component and bind hotkeys before clicking save
Keymap uploaded successfully, but applying as default keymap failed. Error message:
Unable to select keymap. Error message:
Freefire counter acceleration(Higher=heavy, lower=more acceleration)(only available for VIP users)
According to the movement of the mouse, simulate the finger to control the view of the game. The lock hotkey must be set. Press the button to switch display status of the mouse pointer
Please align this Free Look component with the Free Look button in the game (if exists). After the alignment, press the binding key and move your mosue to free look in game

To enable crazy tap, you have to add a conditional crazy tap component in keymap editor. To add such component, you can double click any component in your keymap editor to enter settings. Then click "More" button on the left panel. Then change its type to "Conditional Crazy Tap", and save the keymap
Unable to create a new recoil control config
Anti-recoil Control. Config file not on device. Redownloaded from server
Auto creation of recoil control data failed. Create the data manually and restart AI recoil control system.
Unable to enable recoil control: Error loading recoil control config. Solution: Go to settings - General Recoil Control Settings - Manage Data. Select another data and then select back current data
A new version of firmware is available. It is highly recommended to upgrade to the latest firmware version. Redirect to the firmware upgrade tool?

This option can set how many steps the joystick needs to perform each time it moves to the specified position. If the joystick freezes or the joystick is used abnormally, you can try to adjust this option. It is recommended to use default value

Radius: The movement radius of the joystick, which can also be modified by dragging the indicator ball on the main interface of keymap editor Delayed response: After each button is pressed, the joystick delays the response time, it is recommended to set it to 0
Long Press: switch the radius when the binding key is pressed, and restore when it is released Click: switch or restore the radius when the binding key is pressed
Some of the keymap components cannot be displayed because the data is incorrect.
Some of the keymap components cannot be displayed, probably because this app version is too low.
Some of the keymap components cannot be displayed, error info:
Please select the component type you want
Mapping map version information cannot be obtained. Clicking Save may result in the loss of some mapping information.
The mapping map version is higher than the version of this software. Some information in the maps may not be loaded.
Tips: Double click component to display settings
The account is banned due to some reason, please contact support team
The account is restricted due to too many login devices. Please change the account password to unlock this account

After binding the keys below, drag them on top of the game's crouch component. This component allows users to precise long press the binding key to crouch and release the binding key to stand up. Smart Crouch helps the player to long press crouch correctly without being affected by the game's inability to stand up area.
Components inside the long press trigger group can be triggered by a long press. The long press events and order can be customized. To add a component, drag it onto the long press trigger group.
Macro refers to triggering multiple operations combined to complete a series of operations by pressing the hotkey
This tutorial is shown only once, please take a screenshot for further reference. How to use this macro:

After the user imports the macro from the sharing code, prompt words may be displayed to the user to inform the user how to further set up the macro for different devices. If you want to display a prompt, you can fill in the prompt content in the input box below.
Macro will be terminated/disabled when pressing

Detected you are using android 9 or below. This android version is too old that we don't support anymore. But no worries, you can still activate another phone using this phone. Click OK to redirect to activating another phone page. Click Exit to exit the app
Checking for updates failed, please check your internet connection. If your internet connection is good, please switch to another network or use a VPN
Click Ok to Download New Version

We are spending more than $15000 USD per month on GG Mouse Pro (server fee, internet fee, promotion fee, salary, etc.). Although it is very expensive to maintain this app, we still want to keep it free for you! Therefore, we might import a little bit advertisements. Please enjoy this app and support us!
IMPORTANT!!! For samsung users, if the in-game GG floating icon is not showing, please turn off your phone's Game Booster's "priority mode" as it will block GG Mouse Pro from running
After switching modes, you need to restart the APP, click OK to restart the APP
Error: Failed to get keymap list. error message:
Freefire Premium Sensitivity(better than pc emulator)

It was detected that Android failed to pop up the activation prompt box after you tap the activate button. It is recommended to re-tap the button several times. If it is still not activated, please turn off debug mode in the developer options and then turn it on again.
Cannot redirect to Developer Options automatically. Tap OK to be redirected to settings.
This is a essential step for using this app! Need help on this? Click OK to watch tutorial!
3. Connect to another phone with USB cable
You may need to try several times until the other phone is charging this phone. Please try reconnecting two phones several times until you see the other phone is charging this phone
On the other phone, on App's main page, click "More - Activate Another Device" and follow the instructions there
Open "Activate Another Device" page on the other phone
Activated Status Disappear Frequently？Tap me to see the solution

Please redirect to the Background process limit option in Settings - Developer Options and select At most 4 processes. Note that some android versions automatically change the option back to Standard limit after a while. Therefore, you need to manually select At most 4 processes after that.
1. Turn On "Developer Options" from System Settings
2. Turn On "USB debugging" from Developer Options
Turn on all these options, if available
3. Connect to USB Activation Port On Hardware
You need to do this step once after each reboot
The overlay window permission is only used to display the floating window on the game you are playing.
Gamwing app only use this permission to read/write the exclusive files of Gamwing App. It will not read/modify/delete other app's files
Gamwing app only uses this permission to get the name of the foreground app and use it to determine whether it is a game that the user has chosen to launch. No other usage data will be read or saved
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Start date selection: %1$s – End date selection: %2$s
Tap to switch to Calendar view
Tap to switch to year view
Your login session has expired, please log in again to continue using.

For Android 6 or above, using Bluetooth requires location permission. After tapping OK, the system will prompt a location permission authorization window. Please grant the location permission by clicking Allow. If the window does not appear, please manually go to settings to grant the location permission.

This slider allows you to set the duration of a single tap - that is, the time interval between a simulated finger down and up. For example, if it is set to 100, it will simulate a finger up after 100 milliseconds after finger down for each click. Setting below 100 is not recommended, because it will increase the chance of being banned.

This slider allows you to set the interval between each tap. For example, if it is set to 100, there will be a delay of 100 milliseconds after each tap before the next tap is triggered. Setting below 100 is not recommended, because it will increase the chance of being banned

When the associated viewpoint switch is on, pressing the key that this button is bound to and moving the mouse will control the viewpoint starting from this button position (e.g. small eyes in FPS). If you want to control the small eyes, you can turn this switch on by moving the key and aligning it with the small eyes.
When this switch is on, you can switch mouse display state when pressing the hotkey.

Toggle Lock Trigger Mode: 1. pressing the key to toggle, pressing the bound key to toggle the mouse pointer lock 2. pressing the key to toggle, lifting the bound key to toggle the mouse pointer lock 3. pressing the lift to toggle, pressing and lifting the bound key will toggle the pointer locked/unlocked state once each.

When this switch is turned on, pressing the bound button while the rocker is released will reactivate it. If you experience the joystick not moving after getting on or off, turn this switch on. And set the delay to slightly greater than your average network delay.

When this switch is turned on, the virtual finger that simulates the control of the viewpoint will be lifted and re-pressed when the bound button is pressed at the same time. If you encounter a situation where the viewpoint does not move after getting in and out of the car, turn this switch on. And set the delay to slightly greater than your average network delay.

Continuous Long Press: Triggers a press when you press the keypad, triggers a lift when you release the keypad Single Tap Triggers a tap when you press the keypad Quick Tap: Tap is triggered when keypad is pressed and canceled when keypad is released Press to lift: a single tap is triggered when the keyboard is pressed and released Long press trigger: Android version to come!
Simulates screen touching with different types to choose from
Switch Mouse Display State Trigger Type
Please click "Pair device with pairing code" in "Wireless debugging settings". After that, come back to enter pairing code
Expand this notification to enter pairing code
You can activate GG Mouse Pro now
Start GG Mouse Pro service failed.
GG Mouse Pro service is starting…
Wrong pairing code or need to change notification style to "Android" in phone settings

Some of the permissions required by this app have not been granted. Tap OK to be redirected to the permission authorization tool. You can also manage and grant required permissions for this app by clicking More - Permission Management.
You are using unofficial GG Mouse Pro version. This modified version is unstable and may contain virus to harm your phone. Please uninstall this version and download official version from Google Play
Recognition is disabled because unable to load config
Recognition is disabled because unable to pull recognition keymap
Recognition is disabled because no recognition keymap is set
Please double click panel after weapon recognized
Recognition is disabled. Please select a config first
When this option is on, no control effect when not aiming
Please match the game aiming mode. Mismatching will cause scope recognition to fail
Important: If accessories cannot be recognized, adjust the UI value of pubgm to 15 or higher
Please match the in-game settings. Mismatch may cause recoil control failure
Please match the in-game settings. Mismatch may cause recoil control failure
The higher the frequency, the faster the recognition may be, but it is easy to make device generate more heat and lower FPS

Please reduce the threshold when the accessory is not recognized. When the recognition is wrong, please increase the threshold. Recommended value: 50-80. If it is lower than 50 and accessories still cannot be recognized, please check whether the size of the accessory frame in the smart recognition is consistent with the in-game accessory frame. Consistent size is very important!

AI recognition relys on picture assets such as weapons pictures to do image recognition. Different servers require different materials. Only by selecting the right asset can AI recognition work correctly. If you are PUBGM user, please choose the asset of the international server.

This option sets the number of recognition attempts per second. The higher the number, the faster the recognition may be, but at the same time, it will also cause the device to heat up significantly or lower FPS. The lower the number of times, the recognition may not be so timely, but the load on the device is light. It is recommended that high-performance devices increase this option on demand; low-performance devices reduce this option. For example: devices with the same performance as the Red Magic 8 or above can be set to high or extreme, and the following devices should be set to low or medium

Please lower the threshold when the weapons are not recognized. When the recognition is wrong (for example, Scar is recognized as M4), please increase the threshold. Recommended value: 50-80. If it is lower than 50 and still cannot be recognized, please follow the steps below: 1. Check whether the size of the white icon in the frame of the intelligently recognized weapon is consistent with the size of the M4 in the game (the position does not need to be the same) 2. Check the upper left of the frame of the intelligently recognized firearm Whether the corner is aligned with the upper left corner of the gun frame in the game

Please lower the threshold when the scope is not recognized. When the recognition is wrong (such as 6x scope becomes 8x), please increase the threshold. Recommended value: 60-80. If it is lower than 50 and still cannot be recognized, please check whether the size of the white part in the smart recognition magnification frame is consistent with the 2x magnification in the game (the position does not need to be the same)

If recoil control of all weapons are too much, reduce this value. If recoil control of all weapons are not enough, then increase this value. Note: If only some weapons cannot be suppressed or overpressed, please adjust those weapons individually.
Stop recoil control when not aiming
This operation will delete this data and is irrevocable, continue?
How many times you want this code to be imported by others?
Upload Failed. Unable to Read File
Share Failed. Unable to Read File
Please Save the Share Code (this will never be displayed again)
Rename Failed. Unable to Load File
Rename Failed. Unable to Write File

If clicking "delete this article" is invalid, or there is a problem of confusion after adjusting the pressure gun data and automatically changing back to the original data, the data needs to be repaired. Please fill in the sharing code of the data to be repaired in the input box below, and a new sharing code will be generated after the repair is completed.
Please save your sharing code (this sharing code will not be displayed for the second time). Import the sharing code to get the repaired data
Note: The height of the accessory identification box should be exactly the same as the height of the in-game accessory box! Otherwise it will not be recognized! !
Please cover the fire button on the bullet icon facing left in the game
Please cover the fire button on the bullet icon facing right in the game

Alignment steps: 1. Adjust the "scope size" slider on the upper panel, and adjust the white text in the frame to the same size as the in-game double mirror size 2. Drag the blue dot in the frame to adjust the size of the double mirror frame, The size is slightly larger than the size of the in-game scope (the position of the white part in the frame does not need to be aligned with the in-game scope)
Alignment steps: Please drag it to cover the prone in the game, and use the blue dot in the frame to adjust the size to cover the button in the game
Alignment steps: Please drag it to cover the crouch button in the game, and use the blue dot in the frame to adjust the size to cover the button in the game
Alignment steps: Please drag it to cover the aiming button in the game, and use the blue dot in the frame to adjust the size to cover the button in the game

The upper left corner of the weapon recognition frame should be aligned with the upper left corner of the game weapon frame, and the size of the internal white icon should be adjusted to be consistent with the size of the white icon of the game weapon with the slider above, otherwise weapons will not be recognized!
Tutorial link copied to clipboard. Paste it in your web browser to watch tutorial
Now you can play game with your keyboard
Now you can type with your keyboard
Please enter a density value between 200 and 800
Please enter a size between 500 and 5000
Width should be smaller than height. For example: 1080x1920, 1440x2560, 560x720

Roll the mouse wheel to simulate a finger dragging operation on the screen. When the mouse pointer is displayed, the drag operation will start from the position of the mouse pointer. Otherwise, start at the position where the scroll wheel is mapped
Return Center when Out of Bound
You cannot recover this keymap after deletion. Continue?
Error while pulling keymaps. Restart app may solve this issue
Please save your share code. This code will never appear again.
We recommend you to use a pointer image with transparent background
Finger touches will work with mouse and keyboard at same time
This operation will reset all settings to default, continue?
Success! Click OK to restart the app

After the streamer mode is turned on, all the overlay windows of this app will not be captured by screen recording and screenshots. All windows are only locally visible. This function is invalid on some devices and some system versions.

Send email failed. Please send email manually
Pick an app to send email to us

If you are a customer and need support, please click "I need support" or send email to "support@enjoy.it.bro.com". For premium users, our response time is around 2-24 hours.
If you are seeking collaboration or jobs with us, please click "I want collaboration" or send email to "job@enjoy.it.bro.com"
GG Mouse Pro Support - Device id:
Please wait for user login completed (it usually takes 5 seconds)

Single Way: each time you press the hotkey, simulate a swipe from the starting point to the end point. Round Way: each time you press the hotkey, simulate a swipe from the starting point to the end point, and exchange the starting point with the end point. Mouse Binding: each time you press the hotkey, simulate a swipe from the mouse position to the end point (or slide to the end point of the horizontally, see the description of horizontal swiping)
When the horizontal swiping is turned on, the slide will only slide horizontally, not to the exact location where the end point is located.
After binding the hotkey, you can press the key to switch the display state of the floating ball
After binding the hotkey, you can press the key to switch the display state of the recoil control value panel
Binding key to trigger recoil control
Get premium subscription to use this feature (Just the price of a bottle of water)
This feature requires you to upgrade to premium subscription (Just the price of a bottle of water)
Upgrade to premium account to unlock more features
Please wait several seconds for keymap loading. If this prompt continue to show after 15 seconds, please restart the app
